snippet: The general, Khalifa Hifter, has led a six-month campaign to rid the violence-torn country of Islamists.
abstract: Khalifa Hifter, Libyan general who has led a six-month campaign to rid the country of Islamists, sharply escalates his attacks on Benghazi; launches concerted ground assault and airstrikes, pledging to give up command if he succeeds.

byline.original: By SULIMAN ALI ZWAY and DAVID D. KIRKPATRICK
byline.contributor: Suliman Ali Zway reported from Tobruk, and David D. Kirkpatrick from Tunis. Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The general, Khalifa Hifter, has led a six-month campaign to rid the violence-torn country of Islamists.
